definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: He loves to squash capsules of truth?
sentences.chinese: 且不說這個，他很喜歡擠真理的氣泡嗎？

sentences.english: Among other things, it would not put us on our way to a cleaner environment.
sentences.chinese: 別的且不說，它不會把我們引向一個更爲乾淨的未來。

sentences.english: You may be admitted to a well-known college and win scholarships, not to mention gaining the admiration of your teachers and parents.
sentences.chinese: 且不說師長稱羨，升名校，獲高獎也都是小菜一碟。
